name: Simple Infinite Runner
description:
This is a simple infinite runner I made using GDevelop. It has a score counter and it records your previous score. The speed of the moving platforms increases over time. Also, there are platforms that move vertically.

To play:

  1. Extract the .zip file
  2. Open the extracted file
  3. Double-click Simple_Infinite_Runner.exe

Bugs:

-At the start of the game, the speed of the platforms can increase dramatically.
